nodes.text: Stanel Andaren Thul was a Human male General of House Thul and the father of Daria Thul.

In 3643 BBY, Stanel Thul was He was in charge of House Thul's forces at Outpost Bolym. His daughter, Daria, led an inspection team until they were captured by Killiks. Stanel was worried and tasked an Imperial spacer to rescue his daughter and three Inspection teams from the Hive. As his daughter was returned to him, he was shocked by the condition she was in.

He and Agent Craige Graf of the Imperial Intelligence later tasked the Imperial spacer with destroying a nearby fortress of House Ulgo. After the job was done, Stanley announced that he could now use his forces for rooting out the nearby Killiks.

Upon returning his daughter to Stanel, the player is given the choice to either suggest taking revenge on the Killiks (dark side choice) or to give her time to accustom herself (light side choice).[source?]
